entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain and ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023
